text: Kazhutʹ, "O lyudy svyatoho pysannya, vy ne mayete bazy do vas uphold Torah, ta Yevanheliye, ta shcho posylayetʹsya vnyz do vas herein z vashoho Lorda." Dlya vpevnenykh, tsykh vidkryttiv z vashoho Lorda vyklykayutʹ bahato z nykh shchob porynuty bilʹsh hlybokyy u porushennya ta disbelief. Tomu, ne vidchuvayutʹ zasmucheni dlya disbelieving lyudy
